Scripts.OnLoad: local L = LM_Localize self.Text:SetText(L.LM_COPY_TARGETS_MOUNT) self.SetOption = function (self, setting) if not setting or setting == "0" then LM_Options.db.profile.copyTargetsMount = false else LM_Options.db.profile.copyTargetsMount = true end end self.GetOption = function (self) return LM_Options.db.profile.copyTargetsMount end self.GetOptionDefault = function (self) return true end LiteMountOptionsControl_OnLoad(self)

local L = LM_Localize self.Text:SetText(L.LM_DISABLE_NEW_MOUNTS) self.SetOption = function (self, setting) if not setting or setting == "0" then LM_Options.db.profile.excludeNewMounts = false else LM_Options.db.profile.excludeNewMounts = true end end self.GetOptionDefault = function (self) return false end self.GetOption = function (self) return LM_Options.db.profile.excludeNewMounts end LiteMountOptionsControl_OnLoad(self)

local L = LM_Localize self.Text:SetText(L.LM_ENABLE_DEBUGGING) self.SetOption = function (self, setting) if not setting or setting == "0" then LM_Options.db.char.debugEnabled = false else LM_Options.db.char.debugEnabled = true end end self.GetOptionDefault = function (self) return false end self.GetOption = function (self) return LM_Options.db.char.debugEnabled end LiteMountOptionsControl_OnLoad(self)
